name: Framework Compliance Enforcement
description: Enforces mandatory compliance with Framework Rules (PreToolUse + PostToolUse)

PreToolUse.name: Validate File Authorization Before Write
PreToolUse.description: RULE 2: Check file_manifest.json BEFORE Write operation (proactive)

PreToolUse.name: Enforce State Tracking Before Operations
PreToolUse.description: RULE 14: Verify state files updated BEFORE allowing next operation (proactive)

PreToolUse.name: Enforce Context Management Before Operations
PreToolUse.description: RULE 10: Block if context exceeds 75% emergency threshold (proactive)

PostToolUse.name: Validate State Tracking After Edits
PostToolUse.description: Verifies state files updated after Read/Edit/Write operations (RULE 14)

PostToolUse.name: Validate State Tracking After Bash
PostToolUse.description: Verifies state files updated after Bash operations (RULE 14)

rules_enforced: RULE 2: Named Files Only (PreToolUse - blocks unauthorized files BEFORE creation)
RULE 10: Context Management (PreToolUse - blocks if context >75%)
RULE 14: State Tracking (PreToolUse - blocks if state files stale + PostToolUse validates after)
RULE 15: Visible Tracking (PostToolUse - reminds to display checkpoint box)
RULE 17: Next Steps (PostToolUse - reminds to display at end of response)
notes: NEW in v2.0.0: PreToolUse hooks validate BEFORE tool execution (proactive)
PostToolUse hooks run AFTER tool completion (reactive)
PreToolUse can block operations by exiting with error code
PostToolUse provides feedback Claude MUST address
Hook output treated as user feedback per Claude Code system instructions
If PreToolUse validation fails, tool execution is blocked
If PostToolUse validation fails, Claude sees error and MUST fix before continuing

version_history.3.0.0: Added PreToolUse hooks for RULE 10 and RULE 14 proactive enforcement (prevents persistent violations)
version_history.2.0.0: Added PreToolUse hook for RULE 2 proactive enforcement
